alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 14 at 10:12AM CST until December 14 at 1:15PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Amite County in southern Mississippi... Eastern Wilkinson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 115 PM CST. * At 1012 AM CST, Local law enforcement reported flooded cars and water in homes in the Woodville to Crosby areas. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. Additional heavy rain is expected when a line of storms begins to move east later in the day. Use extreme caution in these areas. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Woodville and Crosby. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
